name: Harrow
description: Achieve redemption through vengeance. The monastic Harrow increases damage to support allies. Defy enemies and ascend.

abilities.name: Condemn
abilities.description: Cast a wave of energy that chains them where they stand. Each enemy held reinforces Harrow's shields.

abilities.name: Penance
abilities.description: Sacrifice Shields to boost Reload Speed, and Fire Rate while converting damage inflicted on enemies into health for Harrow and nearby allies.

abilities.name: Thurible
abilities.description: Channel Harrow's energy into the Thurible to generate a buff. Once finished, kill enemies to bestow nearby allies with bursts of energy. The more energy channeled the greater the reward for each kill. Headshots produce extra energy.

abilities.name: Covenant
abilities.description: Protect nearby allies with an energy force that absorbs all damage and converts it to a Critical Chance bonus for all those under the Covenant. Headshots are amplified even further.

languages.description: Erlange Erlösung durch Rache. Der klösterliche Harrow erhöht den Schaden seiner Verbündeten, um diese zu unterstützen. Trotze deinen Feinden und steige auf.
languages.name: Harrow

languages.description: Atteignez la rédemption par la vengeance. Harrow augmente les Dégâts pour soutenir les alliés. Défiez les ennemis et élevez-vous.
languages.name: Harrow

languages.description: Ottieni la redenzione attraverso la vendetta. Il monastico Harrow aumenta i danni per supportare gli alleati. Sfida i tuoi nemici e ascendi.
languages.name: Harrow

languages.description: 복수를 통해 구원을 달성해 보세요. 수도자와 같은 해로우는 피해량을 향상시킴으로써 아군을 지원합니다. 적들을 거스르고 승화해 보세요.
languages.name: 해로우

languages.description: Logra la redención a través de la venganza. El monástico Harrow aumenta el daño para apoyar a los aliados. Desafía a los enemigos y asciende.
languages.name: Harrow

languages.description: 通过复仇来实现救赎。僧侣般的 Harrow 会增幅友军的杀伤力，为其提供支援。克敌制胜，超越自我。
languages.name: Harrow

languages.description: Достичь искупления через месть. Монах Харроу увеличивает урон, наносимый союзниками. Бросьте вызов врагам и вознеситесь.
languages.name: Харроу

languages.description: 復讐によって償いを得よ。修道士のHarrowは味方をサポートしてダメージを増加させる。敵に逆らい、昇華せよ。
languages.name: Harrow

languages.description: Dokonaj odkupienia poprzez zemstę. Zakonny Harrow zwiększa obrażenia, aby wesprzeć sojuszników. Przeciwstaw się wrogom i powstań.
languages.name: Harrow

languages.description: Alcance a redenção através da vingança. O monástico Harrow aumenta o dano dos seus aliados. Desafie os inimigos e ascenda ao próximo plano.
languages.name: Harrow

languages.description: 通過復仇來達成救贖。苦行的 Harrow 增加傷害來支援友方。對抗敵人並超脱。
languages.name: Harrow

languages.description: Harrow คือนักบวชที่ไถ่บาปด้วยการล้างแค้น เพิ่มความเสียหายเพื่อช่วยเหลือพันธมิตร ท้าทายศัตรูและเฟื่องฟูอำนาจ
languages.name: Harrow

languages.description: İntikam yoluyla kurtuluşa ulaş. Manastır Harrow, hasarı artırarak müttefikleri destekler. Düşmanlara meydan oku ve yükselişe başla.
languages.name: Harrow

languages.description: Спокута досягається помстою. Чернець Гарроу збільшує завдавану шкоду від союзників. Киньте виклик ворогам та вознесіться над ними.
languages.name: Гарроу
